Option A explains electron-positron annihilation producing a gamma photon, which is a form of annihilation, and option B discusses the equivalence between mass and energy (E=mcÂ²), which is relevant to understanding the conversion of mass into energy during annihilation. Therefore, these two events would most directly set up and cause the introduction to pair production.
